member.name: M:MatrixMath.MultiplyScalar(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Double)
member.summary: Multiplies a matrix by a scalar value.
member.param: The matrix to multiply (must be 2D or 3D).
The scalar value to multiply the matrix by.
member.returns: Returns the resulting matrix from multiplying the matrix by the scalar. Returns a matrix containing -1 if the matrix is not 2D or 3D.
